title: Iron-Gold - GGLoL Mini 5v5 Tournament #1

embed.description: This is the Mini GGLoL Tournament! We are only looking for OCE competitiors (sorry NA :c) to come join in on our Iron...

body:
Hello! o/
Gaming Gurus are hosting another 5v5 tournament! 
This time it'll be aimed towards ranks of Iron -> Gold division! 

Please contact the Tournament Organisers by going through the contact list **via Battlefy link** for a join code to sign up your team to this upcoming tournament!

**Requirements**: Join code, contact us through Discord or Battlefy.
**Conditions:** It will be BO1 with Single Elimination with enabled 3rd Place.
**Rewards:** RP and more!

Thank you, hope to see some of you gamers there!
Farewell :)
